programme.title: Hea inimene
programme.desc: Film jalgib Allisoni, kelle elu laguneb koost saatusliku õnnetuse tõttu.

programme.title: Pahad poisid 3
programme.desc: Pahad poisid Mike Lowrey ja Marcus Burnett on jalle koos, et teha viimane uhine sõit.

programme.title: Surnud ei tunne valu
programme.desc: Kaks teerajajat võitlevad kodusõja ajal Ameerika piiril oma elu ja armastuse eest.

programme.title: Kapten Saablihammas ja võluteemant
programme.desc: "Kapten Saablihammas ja võluteemant" – poorased seiklused Kariibi mere saartel. Kui akna taga paugub pakane, on parim aeg pakkida seljakott ja sõita kaugetele Kariibi mere saartele sinna peidetud aaret otsima. Kuri džungliprints Megan Han ja Kariibi mere piraat kapten Saablihammas ajavad juba ammu võluteemandi jalgi... Sellest peale, kui Lama Rama kuningriigi valitseja prints Rava selle olemasolu valja lobises. See ei ole harilik kalliskivi. Taiskuu ajal võib see taita kõige salajasemad soovid, ukskõik milline see soov ka poleks. Džungliprints annaks ara kõik siin maailmas, et vabaneda paikesevalguse kartusest ja lõpuks džunglihamarusest valja paaseda. Kui aga teemandi leiaks mereroovel Saablihammas, kaunistaks ta terve oma lossi kulla ja kalliskividega – maailma kõige ilusam ja targem piraat on ju ometigi seda vaart.

programme.title: Alita
programme.desc: Filmimaailma visionaarid James Cameron ja Robert Rodriguez loovad seninagematu kangelanna ambitsioonikas ulmeseikluses "Alita: Sõjaingel". See on lugu lootusest, armastusest ja vaprusest. Mitmesaja aasta kaugusel tulevikus satub "kuber-arst" Ido (Christoph Waltz) Raudlinna prugimaelt teadvuseta kuborgi Alita (Rosa Salazar), kes on usna kehvas seisus. Ärgates ei maleta Alita midagi oma minevikust, ei sellest, kes ta on ega maailmast enda umber. Kõik on uus, iga kogemus esmakordne. Ido puuab tudrukut kaitsta tolle salaparase mineviku eest, samas kui Alita uus sõber Hugo (Keean Johnson) pakub abi kadunud malestuste taastamiseks. See aga toob Alita kannule tumedad jõud, kes ei peatu millegi ees, et kadumalainud kuborg igaveseks vaigistada...

programme.title: Raamatuvaras
programme.desc: USA-Saksamaa 2013 sõjadraamaLavastaja: Brian PercivalOsades: Geoffrey Rush, Sophie Nelisse, Emily Watson, Ben Schnetzer1939. aasta Natsi-Saksamaa. Riik hoiab hinge kinni. Surmal pole veel kunagi nii palju tegemist olnud. Liesel Meminger (filmimaailma uustulnuk Sophie Nelisse) on 9-aastane tudruk, kes asub elama kasupere juurde, sest tema vanemad on saadetud koonduslaagrisse. Tema sumpaatne kasuisa Hans Huberman (Oscari-võitja Geoffrey Rush) tutvustab tutarlapsele raamatute võlumaailma, õpetades teda ka lugema. Kuid ilmselt ei saa olla enam halvemat aega, millal lugemisest innustuda, sest natsipartei võimuloleku aastatel on tsensuur ja sellest tingitud massilised raamatupõletamised saanud igapaevasteks nahtusteks. Nii tuleb oma isikliku raamatukogu loomiseks kasutusele võtta suhteliselt aarmuslikud meetmed. Seda suurem on aga rõõm nende jagamisest nii oma kasupere, naabrite, kui ka juudi soost noormehega, keda nad oma maja keldris varjavad. "Raamatuvaras" põhineb Markus Zusaki samanimelisel, ulemaailmsel bestselleril.

programme.title: Maskeeritud spioonid
programme.desc: USA 2019 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Nick Bruno, Troy Quane Osades(haaled):Mart Avandi,Marten Manniste,Ülle Kaljuste,Elina Purde,Indrek Ojari, Tiit Sukk, Tarmo Mannard,Liisu Krass Superspioon Lance Sterling (Mart Avandi) ja noor teadlane Walter Beckett (Marten Manniste) on taielikud vastandid. Lance on lihvitud, elegantne ja ohtlik, Walter... ei ole. Aga selle, mis Walteril jaab puudu suhtlusoskuses ja kõiges muus, teeb Walter tasa nutikate leiutistega, mida Lance oma missioonidel kasutab. PÄrast seda, kui sundmused võtavad vagagi ootamatu poorde, peavad Lance ja Walter lootma teineteise peale taiesti uuel moel. Kui see kummaline paar ei suuda õppida koostood tegema, siis on ohus kogu maailm.

programme.title: Peletiste perekond 2
programme.desc: Mida uuemat on peletiste maailmas? Pulm! Baaba-Jagaa ja tema kallim Renfield, krahv Dracula teener, otsustasid oma tundeid mitte varjata ja... lasta end laulatada! Aga tseremoonia ei jõua alatagi, kui see tuleb katkestada! Kõigi kulaliste silme all roovib armunud noorpaari uleloomulike võimetega peletisekutt Mila Starr. Selgub, et vaike roovija on miljardarist teadlase ainuke tutar ja taidab oma hullu isa antud ulesannet! Sellest lapsukesest tasub eemale hoida - ta on kiire kui tuul ja varustatud selliste abivahenditega, mida kadestaks ka James Bond ise!

programme.title: Cantervillei lossi vaim
programme.desc: Kummitus sir Simon de Canterville on juba 300 aastat oma lossis elanud ja talle vaga meeldib seal. Sir Cantervillei lõbustab lossi vahetevahel sattuvate kulaliste kiire lahkumine, kui nad teda kohtavad. Kuid uhel paeval kolib vanasse lossi Otise perekond ja see seltskond on vanale vaimule šokk! Uued lossiomanikud ei karda kummitusjutte, nad peavad neid... natuke vanamoelisteks. Ükskõik, kui õudseid lugusid Sir Canterville valja mõtleb, meeldivad need perekonnale vaga. Vana kummitus tiirutab oma lossis ringi, hoides peast kinni! Kuidas on see võimalik?! Otiste vembumeestest poisid, kaksikud Kent ja Louis, hirmutavad hoopis teda ennast! Ja saadiku naine, proua Lucretia, soovitab sooril oma kolisevad ketid õlitada, sest selle mura sees on võimatu uinuda! Sir Canterville on asja parast vaga mures. Kui asjad nii jatkuvad, kaotab ta igaveseks maine kõige hirmsama kummitusena! Ootamatult aga sõbruneb Sir Canterville pere noordaami Virginiaga. Võluv kummitus raagib talle oma uskumatu eluloo ja siis algavad tõelised seiklused, mis on tais põnevaid ullatusi.

programme.title: Hunt ja lõvi
programme.desc: Muusikakooli õpilane Alma (Molly Kunz) ei osanud oodata, et kui ta parast vanaisa surma kodumaale naaseb, muutub tema elu taielikult. Ootamatult ilmub kohale vanaisa sõber valge emahunt, kaasas kutsikas, kelle ta jatab elutuppa laua alla, et siis ise kaduda. Samal ajal juhtub laheduses lennuõnnetus ja tudruk leiab lennuki rusudest imekombel ellu jaanud lõvikutsika. Nii hakkasidki pisikesed koos elama ja Almast sai nende kasuema. Õlgadele langenud vastutuskoorem ahvardab Alma jalust niita, kuid siiski otsustab ta mõlemad loomapojad ules kasvatada.

programme.title: Kuningas Arthur
programme.desc: USA / Suurbritannia / Iirimaa 2004 ajalooline seiklusfilm Lavastaja:Antoine Fuqua Osades:Clive Owen, Stephen Dillane, Keira Knightley Legendil põhinev lugu raagib kuningas Arturist (Clive Owen) ja tema ruutlitest. Tegevus toimub Rooma impeeriumi aegsel Inglisaal, mida ohustab suur ja võimas sakside hord. Kuna roomlastel on niigi raskusi enda territooriumi hoidmisega, otsustavad nad Inglismaa saksidele jatta. Kohalikud põlisrahvad aga otsustavad vaenlase vastu võidelda. Nende juhiks saab inglismaal roomlaste leeris ilma teinud vaejuht Artur.

programme.title: Vereraamatud
programme.desc: Clive Barkeri õudusromaanidel põhinev film, kus kolm lugu sulanduvad uheks nii ajas kui ka ruumis, pannes publiku ahhetama ja sudame ebatervislikult kiiresti põksuma.

programme.title: Kõik mangu
programme.desc: Selleks, et maksta oma õpingute eest mainekas Princetoni ulikoolis, kogub Richie (Justin Timberlake) raha internetikasiinodes. Algsest edust tiivustatuna laheb ta valja suure riski peale ning jaab kõigest ilma. Uskudes, et teda on petetud, lendab Richie eksootilisse Costa Ricasse, et nõuda aru netimangude magnaadilt Ivan Blockilt (Ben Affleck), kelle susteemile ta kaotas.Richiet uimastab algselt Blocki kulluslik elustiil: jahid, villad, kaunid naised, eralennukid, ning lubadus tohutust rikkusest, aga siis saab ta teada hairiva tõe oma võõrustaja kohta. Kui FBI puuab sundida Richiet aitama neid Blocki tabamisel, seisab poiss silmitsi oma senise elu suurima õnnemanguga: kuidas kavaldada ule kaks jõudu, mis mõlemad ahvardavad teda laiaks litsuda.

programme.title: Kutsuge McCall 2
programme.desc: Denzel Washington naaseb uhe oma margilise rolli juurde, mangides oma karjaari esimeses jarjefilmis. Robert McCall on kartmatu õigluse eest võitleja, ekspluateeritute ja rõhutute kaitsja. Aga kui kaugele on ta valmis minema siis, kui jutt kaib talle kallist inimesest?

programme.title: Nahahooldus
programme.desc: Kuulsa kosmeetiku Hope Goldmani nahahooldusari langeb sabotaaži ohvriks, kui konkurent Angel Vergara avab ule tanava enda salongi. Sõber Jordani abiga puuab Hope paljastada, kes uritab tema mainet rikkuda.

programme.title: Joomapidu
programme.desc: Tume komoodia maailmast, kus narkootikumid ja alkohol on illegaalsed, kuid uhel paeval aastas võivad kõik tagajargedele mõtlemata end vabaks lasta ja kõike tarvitada. Kolm kaheksateistkumneaastast on otsustanud just seda teha.

programme.title: Kummaline maagia
programme.desc: USA 2015 animakomoodiaLavastaja: Gary RydstromMuusikaline muinasjutt raagib varvikast seltskonnast, kuhu kuuluvad haldjad, kollid, paharetid ja igasugu teised maagilised tegelased, kes võitlevad uhe vaga võimsa võlujoogi nimel.

programme.title: Kauboid ja tulnukad
programme.desc: USA 2011 ulmemarulLavastaja: Jon FavreauOsades: Daniel Craig, Harrison Ford, Olivia Wilde, Sam RockwellAasta 1873, Arizona. Jake (Daniel Craig) on erak, kes arkab ootamatult ules keset kõrbet, koos malukaotuse ja salaparase kaevõruga. Otsides vastuseid oma minevikule, siseneb ta Absolutioni linna, kus ta peagi avastab, et ta on kurjategija, keda pool kõrbe taga otsib. Kuid peatselt peab Absolutioni linn silmitsi seisma mustiliste lendavate objektidega, kes tõmbavad iga ettejuhtuva kulaelaniku enda laeva. Äkitselt muutub Jake kulaelanike jaoks kui kaitseingliks, kui nad saavad aru, et Jake hoiab enda kaes võtit, mis võib paasta nende elud.

programme.title: Transformerid
programme.desc: 1994. Trasnformerite saagas pooratakse uus lehekulg, kui autobottide ja decepticonide lõputusse võitlusesse tõmmatakse uut tõugu transformerid, end sajandeid meie planeedil varjanud maksimalid. Optimus Prime oma kaaslastega tervitab uusi liitlasi avasuli, sest lahenev Unicron on ohtlikum kõigest, mis neid mehaanilisi kangelasi seni ahvardanud.

programme.title: Kuidas Grinch jõulud varastas
programme.desc: USA-Saksamaa 2000 jõulukomoodia Lavastaja:Ron Howard Osades:Jim Carrey, Jeffrey Tambor, Christine Baranski Grinch (Jim Carrey) on karvane roheline olevus, kes elab Kellekula kohal kõrguva Mornimae sisemuses asuvas koopas. Kui maailmas on midagi, mida Grinch ei salli, siis on selleks jõulud. Saatjaks vaid ta truu koer Max, on Grinch mõelnud valja plaani, kuidas lahenevad jõulud Kellekulas kõigile meelde jaaks. Ta kavatseb varastada kogu linnast kõik kingitused, sest mis jõulud need ilma kingitusteta ikka on? Film kandideeris kolmele Oscarile, võites parima grimmi kategoorias.

programme.title: Laula
programme.desc: USA 2016 animakomoodia. Kui meelelahutusaris padeva koaala Buster Mooni (Matthew McConaughey) teatrit ahvardab sulgemine, korraldab ta lauluvõistluse. See annab kohalikele loomadele võimaluse end teostada. Siga Rosita (Reese Witherspoon) on koduperenaine, kes on loobunud oma teismeliseea unistusest lauljaks saada. Teismeline okassiga Ash (Scarlett Johansson) on punkrokkar alternatiivmuusikat viljelevas bandis. Gorilla Johnnyt (Taron Egerton) veenab ta isa Suur Issi (Peter Serafinowicz) enda eeskujul pangaroovliks hakkama. Kõik need loomad tahavad oma unelmaid taita ja kogu sudamest laulda. Lavastaja:Garth Jennings Osades (haaled):Hele Kõrve (Ash), Mait Malmsten (Lance), Margus Tabor (Preili Crawly), Jaan Rekkor (Big Daddy) , Sergo Vares (Buster Moon) , Indrek Taalmaa (Norman), Juss Haasma (Eddie), Tiit Sukk (Gunter), Ott Sepp (Johnny), Gerli Padar (Meena), Andero Ermel (Mike), Anne Reemann (Nana).

programme.title: 1+1 on pere
programme.desc: Prantsusmaa / Suurbritannia 2016 komoodia Lavastaja:Hugo Gelin Osades: Omar Sy, Clemence Poesy, Antoine Bertrand Samuel elab kohustuste-ja vastutusvaba elu Lõuna-Prantsusmaa paikselisel merekaldal inimeste keskel, keda ta armastab ja kellega koos tootab, ilma et end vaga ara vasitaks.Ühel paeval aga jatab uks Samueli endisi voodikaaslasi tema katte paarikuuse beebi Gloria - tema tutre! Suutmata lapse eest hoolitseda, otsustab Samuel ta emale tagasi viia ja sõidab ruttu Londonisse lootusega ta ules leida, kuid tulutult.Kaheksa aastat hiljem, kui lahutamatuteks muutunud Samuel ja Gloria elavad Londonis, naaseb Gloria ema oma tutart tagasi nõudma...

programme.title: Judy
programme.desc: Legendaarne Judy Garland saabub 1968. aasta talvel Londonisse, et anda terve seeria valjamuudud kontserte.

programme.title: Lindmees ehk (võhiklikkuse ootamatu voorus)
programme.desc: Endine filmimaailma supertaht Riggan Thomson (Michael Keaton) lavastab Broadwayl ambitsioonikat naidendit, mille abil loodab varskendada oma liisunud karjaari. See on riskantne, ent ta loodab, et ta loominguline õnnemang tõestab, et ta on tõeline kunstnik, mitte lihtsalt kustunud filmitaht. Esietenduse lahenedes saab uks naitlejatest vigastuse, mistõttu peab Riggan palkama asendusnaitleja, kes tõenaoliselt omajagu segadust tekitab. Samal ajal peab Riggan tegelema oma kallima, tutre ja endise naisega. Film võitis mitu Oscarit.

programme.title: Lennuplaan
programme.desc: USA 2005 põnevik Lavastaja: Robert Schwentke Osades: Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean, Kate Beahan, Michael Irby Kassahitist põnevusfilm Kylest (Jodie Foster), kes ilmselt ainukesena usub, et tema kuueaastane tutar astus koos temaga lennuki pardale, aga on nuud kadunud. Kyle sõidab koos oma tutrega Berliinist New Yorki. Masenduses oma mehe surmast, vajub Kyle mõttesse kuid toibununa markab, et tema tutar on kadunud. Keegi peale Kylei ei taha uskuda, et laps uldse pardale tuli. Ema on murest hullumas kuid peab uksi selle mõistatuse lahendama ja tutre paastma, maksku see, mis maksab.

programme.title: Kingsman
programme.desc: USA-Suurbritannia 2014 seikluskomoodia. Lavastaja: Matthew Vaughn Osades: Colin Firth, Taron Egerton, Samuel L. Jackson "Kingsman: Salateenistus" on Mark Millari ("Wanted", "Kick-Ass") ja Dave Gibbonsi ("Watchmen") populaarsel koomiksil põhinev haarav lugu supersalajasest spioonide organisatsioonist, mille esiagent (Colin Firth) varbab lihvimata, kuid paljulubava tanavapoisi (Taron Egerton), kes kaasatakse agentuuri kurnavasse treeningprogrammi ajal, kui esile kerkib ulemaailmne oht vaarastunud tõekspidamistega miljardarist tehnoloogiageeniuse (Samuel L. Jackson) naol. Lavastaja: Matthew Vaughn Osades: Colin Firth, Taron Egerton, Samuel L. Jackson

programme.title: Kagu
programme.desc: Massumeelne teismeline Gretchen (Hunter Schafer) sõidab vastumeelselt isa ja kasuemaga Ameerikast Saksamaale, kus kaunite Alpi magede jalamil asuvast kuurordist saab nende uus kodu. Neid võtab vastu isa tulevane ulemus harra Konig (Dan Stevens), kes tunneb kohe haiglast huvi Gretcheni tumma poolõe vastu ja kaitub uleuldse pisut veidralt. Miski tundub selles pealtnaha rahulikus paradiisi meenutavas paigas uldse vaga korrast ara olevat. Minestunult kokku kukkuvad kliendid, kummalised haaled ja Gretcheni viirastuslikud nagemused viivad neiu lõpuks šokeeriva avastuseni, mida ta poleks ka kõige hullemas unenaos osanud naha.

programme.title: Gnomeo ja Julia
programme.desc: Klassikaline lugu vaenutsevatest suguvõsadest armunud aiapakapikkudest... Perede arvates ei tohiks nad koos olla, kuid ustavate sõprade abiga tõestavad nad oma armastuse tugevust. 2011, subtiitrid.

programme.title: Erakordne harra Rogers
programme.desc: Sudamlik, biograafiline draama. Aastal 1998 saadetakse kuuniline akirjanik Lloyd Vogel intervjueerima legendaarset Ameerika lastesaatejuhti Fred Rogersit. Ajakirjanik leiab, et see ulesanne pole tema kaliibri vaariline ja laheb intervjuud tegema sooviga paljastada Rogers teeskluselt. Fred Rogers on aga tõepoolest heasudamlik ja siiras ning kohtumine temaga muudab Vogeli elu põhjalikult. R: Marielle Heller. O: Matthew Rhys, Tom Hanks, Susan Kelechi Watson, Chris Cooper. Ajakiri Time valis teose aasta kumne parima filmi hulka. Tom Hanks palvis oma rolliga Oscari ja Kuldgloobuse nominatsiooni.

Pludmales volejbols. Latvijas čempionāts "Depo Open" vīriešiem
WRC
programme.desc: Sports magazine in which viewers have a chance to find out the latest news and all the amazing action from the World Rally Championship, organised by the FIA- Federation Internationale de lAutomobile.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: 1. Bundesliga
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.desc: A military family wants to find a beachfront condo in Fort Walton Beach, Florida. He may have to relocate at any moment, so they want somewhere to return to.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A young couple are determined to find a historic house with character in Minnesota. Theyre hoping to find a home that doesnt need much work and has a garage.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad

programme.title: Kullerilahingud

programme.title: Kullerilahingud

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?

programme.title: Seletamatud paigad
programme.desc: Sinine kuul, mida me nimetame Maaks, jaab suures osas saladuseks 8 miljardile inimesele, kes sellel elavad. Kuidas Maa tekkis ja millised on selle pusimajaamise saladused? Kui kaua inimesed suudavad seda "koduks" nimetada?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natashale teeb nalja klassikaliste põrkeautode vedu, kuid kas see atraktsioon jaab ta laeval terveks? Vahepeal laheb Tamara minigolfi vedu vett vedama, kui 12-osaline alglast muutub 100-osaliseks koormaks.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Molly ja Russell avastavad, et filmide maagia on vaid illusioon, kui nad uritavad vedada filmi esilinastuseks ikoonilist filmiautot, samal ajal kui Doug saab teada, et veepargi aeglane jõgi peaks kandma pisut teistsugust nime.

programme.desc: Ameerika Ühendriikide presidendina teeninud mehi ulistatakse kui lugupeetud juhte. Kuid nendega on seotud palju veidraid lugusid. Kas tõde nende hammastavate juttude taga võib umber kirjutada Ameerika minevikku ja ehk ka tulevikku?

programme.desc: Rick, Corey ja Chum puuavad paikesepaistelises osariigis suuri tehinguid! Rannapaevade ja WWE superstaari Titus ONeili õhtusoogi vahel heidab meeskond laialt võrku St. Petersburgis, Floridas.

programme.title: Muistsete tulnukate eriesitlus
programme.desc: Peaaegu kõikidel maakera mandritel võib leida sarnaseid hammastavaid kivikonstruktsioone, mis kujutavad endast seletamatuid ehituskunsti imesid. Kas nende megaliitide ehitamist võis juhtida maavaline kasi?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetik Giorgio Tsoukalos heidab tagasivaatava pilgu kumnele erakordsele olendile, keda oleme uurinud - olenditele, kes võivad pakkuda veenvaid tõendeid maavalise kulaskaigu kohta.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Are reports of a strange swirling vortex with a brilliant white center in the skies over Oklahoma proof of a genuine UFO? Does a video claimed to be discovered sealed in Vatican archives, show a real case of demonic possession?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natasha võtab vastu valjakutse transportida vanaaegne tuletõrjeauto oma algsesse koju, samas kui Molly ja Russelli Hollywoodi malestusesemetega taidetud koormaga kaasnevad omad probleemid.

programme.title: Pandikunnide Ameerika seiklus
programme.desc: Rick, Corey ja Chum tõusevad tuhast ja alustavad otsast peale Phoenixis Arizonas. Vahepeal uurib Rick haruldasi Ameerika vanaaegseid esemeid, Chum vaatab ule 20. sajandi keskpaiga mooblikollektsiooni ja Corey astub areenile poksisuveniiride jahil.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Dave Hester alustab paeva 500-dollarilise miinusega ning uritab end sellest olukorrast paasta. Barry leiab midagi, millega oma aega sisustada, Jarrod ja Brandi aga leiavad midagi vaga vana.

programme.title: Pandikunnid

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja lahingud varvides
programme.desc: Hammastavad, asja varvitud lahingu- ja kroonikakaadrid ning isiklikud malestused viivad meid lahingu sudamesse, mis andis mõlemale poolele katastroofilise loogi ja jattis ule kogu Ida-Belgia mudase kalmistu.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Talismanid pakuvad kaitset ja õnne. Mõne puhul arvatakse isegi, et need kehastavad kõrgemat jõudu. Kas võib olla, et see, mis toidab meie usku talismanidesse, ei ole ebausk, vaid tõeline side millegagi valjaspool meie maailma?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Nova Scotia ranniku lahedal paikneb vaike saar, mis peidab endas mõistatuslikku saladust. 18. sajandil margati seal oositi kummalisi tulesid.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwight ja Tyesha komistavad animatroonilise turannosauruse otsa ja hakkavad seda tukeldama, samal ajal kui Doug haukab liialt suure suutaie, kui ta liigutab hiiglaslikku tagahoovis asuvat piraadilaeva stiilis mangumaja.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natashale teeb nalja klassikaliste põrkeautode vedu, kuid kas see atraktsioon jaab ta laeval terveks? Vahepeal laheb Tamara minigolfi vedu vett vedama, kui 12-osaline alglast muutub 100-osaliseks koormaks.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Molly ja Russell avastavad, et filmide maagia on vaid illusioon, kui nad uritavad vedada filmi esilinastuseks ikoonilist filmiautot, samal ajal kui Doug saab teada, et veepargi aeglane jõgi peaks kandma pisut teistsugust nime.

programme.title: Pandikunnide Ameerika seiklus
programme.desc: Rick, Corey ja Chum tõusevad tuhast ja alustavad otsast peale Phoenixis Arizonas. Vahepeal uurib Rick haruldasi Ameerika vanaaegseid esemeid, Chum vaatab ule 20. sajandi keskpaiga mooblikollektsiooni ja Corey astub areenile poksisuveniiride jahil.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Dave Hester alustab paeva 500-dollarilise miinusega ning uritab end sellest olukorrast paasta. Barry leiab midagi, millega oma aega sisustada, Jarrod ja Brandi aga leiavad midagi vaga vana.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: On olemas salaparased iidsed kivid, mis on vormitud taiuslikeks ringideks. Paljud neist on ilmselgelt inimeste valmistatud ja mõned neist on taiesti seletamatud. Kas kiviringide mõistatus võib anda vihjeid inimkonna tulnukatega seotud mineviku kohta?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Turgi lõunaosas asuva Karahan Tepe iidse megaliidi leiukoha avastamine keerab arheoloogiamaailma pea peale, naidates insenerioskusi, mis uletavad kaugelt seda, milleks tollased inimesed arvati võimelised olevat.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Chum koguvad punkte, katsetades kaupu pinballi-paradiisis. Corey istub sadulasse uhele esemele teisest maailmasõjast, Chum avastab muugis olevad haruldased Sherlock Holmesi raamatud. Rick tervitab džunglis Guns N Rosesi kitarristi ASHBAt.

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui meeskond viib Triangleis labi oma seni kõige ambitsioonikamat eksperimenti, on nad šokeeritud sellest, mis ilmub Skinwalker Ranchi kohal taevasse.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika Ühendriikide presidendina teeninud mehi ulistatakse kui lugupeetud juhte. Kuid nendega on seotud palju veidraid lugusid. Kas tõde nende hammastavate juttude taga võib umber kirjutada Ameerika minevikku ja ehk ka tulevikku?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Chum koguvad punkte, katsetades kaupu pinballi-paradiisis. Corey istub sadulasse uhele esemele teisest maailmasõjast, Chum avastab muugis olevad haruldased Sherlock Holmesi raamatud. Rick tervitab džunglis Guns N Rosesi kitarristi ASHBAt.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Ever since the 1950s, the United States has been building freeways at an unprecedented rate. Host Michael Guillen takes us on a chariot ride through Ancient Rome and discovers that many of the highway amenities date back over 2000 years.

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld
programme.desc: Jatkub jaht uhele lahiajaloo suuremale aardele. Sari "Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld" on tagasi, et jatkata sadu miljoneid dollareid vaart roovsaagi otsingut, mille Jaapani kindral Tomoyuki Yamashita vaidetavalt ara peitis.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: From the icy docks of Bristol to the tropical paradise of the Caribbean, follow the incredible journey of fearsome buccaneers and their hunt for treasure and booty.

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: Tomek uses UV light to scour the beach at night. Krzysztof and his team start digging in the field. Benedykt sails out into the sea in the hopes of catching not only fish, but also finding amber. Dorota has to deal with an unexpected crisis.

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: Worldwide, there have been hundreds of mysterious sightings spanning many centuries. Throughout history, these sightings have spawned countless stories.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Might the tools and technology of ancient builders have come from distant galaxies? If the ancient builders did use advanced technology, could it prove that aliens visited Earth thousands of years ago?

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: USA reisilennukite pilootide sõnul on nad UFO-dega mitmel korral peaaegu kokku põrganud. Elizondo kuuleb uhelt suure lennufirma piloodilt seniraakimata lugu Arizona kohal nahtud helendavast oranžist kerast, mille kohta on ka fototõestus.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Investigation into a huge pulsating light spotted in the sky near Ohio in 1994. A radar operator describes what he saw, explaining he had "never seen anything move so fast".

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: The Wild West was full of gambling, frenzied gold rushes and legendary racketeers. It was a lawless age when people wanted two things: money and a good time.

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: Tomek presents his handicraft at the Amber Fair in Gdansk. Dorota is also present there with her jewellery designs. Benedykts sailing crew finds pieces of amber in their fishnets. Krzysztof argues with the owner of the field.

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: Engrained in the history and mythology of India are tales of a ferocious creature, half-man, half-ape. It has been dubbed the monkey-man and headlines across the world have told of the vicious nocturnal attacks that occurred in New Delhi.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Meremehed on labi ajaloo raakinud legende kadunud salaparastest saartest, arenenud tsivilisatsioonidest ja Eedenit meenutavatest paradiisidest. Kas on võimalik, et need lood ei olegi muudid?

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Humanitys first volcanic hyper eruption blows through the Earths surface. Shockwaves and molten rock destroy buildings and cities. Then as volcanic gas blocks out sunlight, food chains collapse, and epic famine threatens the very future of mankind.

programme.title: Kuidas sunnivad katastroofid
programme.desc: "Engineering Disasters" goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Viikingite maailma kuulsaimast sõdalasest pajatav Beowulfi legend on ulim lugu vaprusest.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Hannibals merciless attacks on Roman soil deal a near fatal blow to the future Empire. Sworn to a blood oath, Hannibal of Carthage does the unthinkable, marching 40 war elephants and an army over the Alps to gain the element of surprise.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: The legendary Nordic warriors used their technically advanced warships and fearsome fighting skills to conquer northern Britain.

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: Tulemas on torm. Tomek seab kiiruga oma varustust valmis. Herkules laheb muusikaklubisse peole. Krzysztofi tiimiga liitub uus liige Bartek. Dorota kaupleb tootlemata merevaigu hinna ule. Formellad purjetavad merele kalavõrke kokku korjama.

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: Worldwide, there have been hundreds of mysterious sightings spanning many centuries. Throughout history, these sightings have spawned countless stories.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Tulnukate eksperdid uurivad võimalust, et uks religioosne reliikvia võib olla maavalist paritolu.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Pulsars are tiny - only a few miles across - but they spin as fast as a kitchen blender and sweep the sky with beacons of radiation that make them appear to flash on and off. Quasars are at the other end of the spectrum.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: Join host Don Wildman as he discovers the massive CuChi tunnel system that gave soldiers the upper hand to the super-bunkers and secret caves used as shelters.

programme.title: Kodusõja kulla needus
programme.desc: Aardejahtijad Rick ja Marty Lagina on nõutud varanduse otsjate poolt ule maailma. Nad loovad kampa samuti Michiganist parit Kevin Dykstraga, et otsida kodusõja paevilt parit smugeldatud rahvuslikku aaret.

programme.title: Up Close and Personal
programme.sub-title: Black Sabbath - Up Close and Personal
programme.desc: This film review draws on archive concert film of Black Sabbath in performance and documentary footage from television and radio archives around the world. We also hear the first-hand accounts from band members Tony Iommi, Glenn Hughes and Geezer Butler backed up by leading journalists and musicians, who help strip away the layers of sensationalism and half-truths to produce the ultimate critical review of Black Sabbath. Featuring highlights from: War Pigs, Killing Yourself to Live, Paranoid, Snowblind, Children of the Grave and more...

programme.title: Florence And the Machine - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Weeknd _ Live in London
programme.desc: The Weeknd urged fans to their feet and leapt around the stage as he headlined the fifth night of the Apple Music Festival in London.

programme.title: Childish Gambino - Live at Rockwood Music Hall
programme.desc: Its been a crazy year for Donald Glover, but nothing has been more blazing than his career as rapper Childish Gambino. The project, born of a Wu-Tang name generator, is full of witty, rambunctious energy, as he effortlessly demonstrates in his session at Rockwood Music Hall. Along with collaborator and musical guru Ludwig Gransson on electric guitar, Gambino rips through tracks from his wildly popular EP as well as the lead single from his debut album Camp (out now on Glassnote Records). From introspection to love to pop culture and punny metaphors, Gambino runs an impressive lyrical gammit, one that inspires all the vital decision making organs.

programme.title: Britney Spears _ Live from London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Britney Spears performs her hits including "Baby One More Time", "Oops! I Did It Again", "Toxic" and many more.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Slash and Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators - Live At the Roxy
programme.desc: Live at the Roxy is a live album and a DVD of the American Guitarist Slash, with vocalist Myles Kennedy and support band The Conspirators. Recorded at the Roxy Theater in West Hollywood, California, it was released on June 15, 2015

programme.title: Up Close and Personal
programme.sub-title: Black Sabbath - Up Close and Personal
programme.desc: This film review draws on archive concert film of Black Sabbath in performance and documentary footage from television and radio archives around the world. programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Justin Bieber - Live at Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: The film follows the pop star Justin Bieber during 10 days counting down to his performance at Madison Square Garden. It also includes footage from his My World Tour, interviews with family and friends, a visit to his original hometown in Canada, and some of the story and videos of his childhood.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Abba are one of Swedens biggest exports and the worlds biggest pop act. With sales estimated at 400 million, as a group they are second only the Beatles. However, the pop music that will be remembered for generations to come grew out of a very different sound. Abba entered the Eurovision heats. They succeeded and performed the song Waterloo in the 1974 contest. The band entered superstar status with the 1976 release of their first greatest hits. The token new song on the record was Fernando. It remains Abbas biggest-selling single to date, with sales of 10 million copies. The late 1970s was a period of unstoppable success for Abba. The 1976 album Arrival, showcased the finely-honed skill of pop song-writing and its lead single, Dancing Queen, was a prime example of that. Featuring archive material, music videos "DANCING QUEEN" "MAMA MIA ABBA" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Green Day - Live at Fox Theater
programme.desc: Live concert of legendary punk-rock band Green Day on April 14, 2009, performing the whole of their imminent new album, "21st Century Breakdown", at the Fox Theater in the bands hometown, Oakland, California.

programme.title: Paul Rodgers - Free Spirit
programme.desc: The 16-song collection, Free Spirit, filmed in London, England returned Paul Rodgers to his roots, bringing fans an extraordinary evening celebrating the music of Free.

programme.title: U2 - Classic Album
programme.sub-title: U2 - Classic Album: The Joshua Tree
programme.desc: The Joshua Tree was the fastest and highest selling album of 1987, representing a life affirming rebuttal of the synthesizer pop of the preceding years. Rocks DNA of blues, folk, gospel and country were he building blocks of the album, fashioned lyrically and acoustically for the 80s. U2 and their producers Brian Eno and Daniel Lanois approached the recording of the album as an experiment, using it as an opportunity for each of them to explore their own ideas, musical political and personal. This program story tells the story of that creative collision.

programme.title: Jake Bugg - Live at Hype Machines Hype Hotel
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old British singer-songwriter Jake Bugg is a man of few words, that is until he begins his strumming. His unique voice is one that finds few, yet highly admirable comparisons - perhaps a rockabilly-folk twangy twist of The Mountain Goats John Darnielle and Colin Meloy of the Decemberists. The release of his self-titled, full-length debut last October sent a sonic shockwave through the music world with songs like the feverishly hooking foot-pounder "Lightning Bolt" and the howling 60s rock sing-along "Two Fingers". Jake took the stage late one evening at Hype Machines Hype Hotel, where he roared through his catalog of catchy hits for an rock-hungry crowd. And we were there to catch the solid solo kid in action.

programme.title: Up Close and Personal
programme.sub-title: Black Sabbath - Up Close and Personal
programme.desc: This film review draws on archive concert film of Black Sabbath in performance and documentary footage from television and radio archives around the world. We also hear the first-hand accounts from band members Tony Iommi, Glenn Hughes and Geezer Butler backed up by leading journalists and musicians, who help strip away the layers of sensationalism and half-truths to produce the ultimate critical review of Black Sabbath. Featuring highlights from: War Pigs, Killing Yourself to Live, Paranoid, Snowblind, Children of the Grave and more...

programme.title: Elvis Costello _ Detour Live At Liverpool Philharmonic Hall
programme.desc: The truly spectacular Detour show from musical legend Elvis Costello was filmed on 15th June 2015 at the Liverpool Philharmonic Hall. This acoustic set with tracks pared right back to the bone allows his voice and the power and emotion of his lyrics to step right to the foreground. The Detour tour allowed Costello to use a Storytellers style to talk about family, life and his career along with the stories behind such songs as " Watching the Detectives ", " Alison ", " A Good Year For the Roses "... The Detour tour was a solo effort with Costello playing guitar and piano. Joining Costello on a few tracks are Rebecca and Meghan Lovell of Larkin Poe.

programme.title: Paul McCartney _ A MusiCaresTribute
programme.desc: The unmistakable Paul McCartney was honored as "Person of the Year" by MusiCares at a gala event that brought together several artists to celebrate the Beatles victorious career.

programme.title: Bowie
programme.sub-title: Bowie: The Man Who Changed the World
programme.desc: Only true legends of rock music are known by one word. As with "Elvis" everyone knows the name of the most creative and influential rock artist of all time: BOWIE. Bowie was in a state of permanent revolution, constantly re-inventing his persona and sound. He defied any label that the music industry tried to place on him. From Thin White Duke to soulful rocker; music, art, fashion and sexuality were Bowies playthings - he was truly an artistic chameleon.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Michael Jackson American singer, songwriter, dancer and simply the King of Pop. His contributions to music, dance, and publicized personal life made him a global figure in popular culture for over four decades. Jackson made his professional debut in 1964 as a member of The Jackson 5, soon becoming a dominant figure in popular music. His music videos, "Beat It"", "Billie Jean"", and "Thriller"" are credited with breaking racism in the USA and transforming the medium into an art form. Thriller is the best-selling album of all time. Jackson was the most awarded recording artist in the history of popular music. Aspects of Jacksons personal life generated controversy and while preparing for his comeback concert series, This Is It, Jackson died of acute Propofol and Benzodiazepine intoxication on June 25, 2009, after suffering from cardiac arrest. The Los Angeles County Department of Medical Examiner Coroner ruled his death a homicide, and his personal physician, Conrad Murray.

programme.title: Paul Simon - Live in New York City
programme.desc: During the first leg of Paul Simons triumphant, 2011 U.S. tour, he thrilled hometown fans with a special club performance at New York Citys historic Webster Hall. The show presents this iconic artist working at the peak of his artistic and creative powers in an unusually intimate setting. The 20-song, 90-minute set list was drawn from his legendary career and includes several songs that havent been performed live in many years. "Kodachrome," "Mother and Child Reunion," "Gone At Last" and "The Obvious Child" are just some of the highlights as well as songs from Simons most recent album, 2011s So Beautiful or So What (Hear Music/Concord Music Group) including "Dazzling Blue," "Rewrite," "The Afterlife" and the albums propulsive title track.

programme.title: The Moody Blues - Days of Future Passed Live
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of their landmark album, Days of Future Passed, The Moody Blues took to the road to perform the entire LP live. This film, capturing an electric evening at The Sony Centre, Toronto, where the band was joined on stage by a full orchestra for the first time ever, is the definitive performance of this seminal album. This spectacle of a show features stunning visuals and a unique narration performed by Jeremy Irons, transporting the audience and viewer to the psychedelic dream world of their classic record. Including the iconic hits Nights In White Satin and Tuesday Afternoon, this film truly pays homage to five decades of musical mastery. In this impressive yet intimate auditorium, The Moody Blues have never sounded better.

programme.title: Lady Gaga _ Live in London
programme.desc: Lady Gagas performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstars first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura"; "MANiCURE"; "Artpop"; "Jewels N Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista; "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine"; and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that shes "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: The story of Fleetwood Mac is one of two halves. The first half began within the British blues scene of the late 1960s, where the bands founder, Peter Green, honed his talent. Peter Green asked fellow Bluesbreakers John McVie and Mick Fleetwood to form a new band after they successfully collaborated in the studio on an instrumental with Jeremy Spencer and Bob Brunning completing the line-up. They took on the new name of Fleetwood Mac. The band had success in the UK with their first two albums and in 1968, with the addition of guitarist, Danny Kirwan, they finally achieved their first number one single, Albatross. However, Fleetwood Macs third album, They Play On, would be Peter Greens last with the band, Without Peter Green, Danny Kirwan would take on the lead role within the group In 1970, Christine McVie, the wife of John McVie was yet another addition, after having provided backing vocals and album artwork for the new line-up. Yet more changes came to the bands line-up with Kirwan sadly having to leave due to problems with alcoholism, Songwriter Bob Welch replaced him, but then departed shortly after. Fleetwood Mac with the line-up of Mick Fleetwood, Stevie Nicks, Lindsey Buckingham and John and Christine McVie entered its second chapter. In 1975 they released what would ironically be their second self-titled album, which would top the US Billboard chart and featured the hit single Rhiannon, written by Stevie Nicks But as the album reached number one in the US and began shifting units of over five million, the bands personal lives were becoming strained. In 1977 the band released Rumours. The lyrics of the songs written by each member of the band exposed the personal turmoil that existed within the group Rumours has, to date, sold over 45 million copies worldwide, making it one of the biggest selling albums of all time. Influenced by new wave and punk, Buckingham convinced the band to go for a more experimental approach for the highly-anticipated follow-up album, Tusk. Featuring archive material, music videos "Dreams" "Landslide" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.title: Santana _ Plays The Blues
programme.sub-title: Santana _ Plays The Blues: Live at Montreux
programme.desc: July 12, 2004 was a very special night at the Montreux Festival for any blues fan. With Carlos Santana as musical director (and special guest guitarist), three musical legends took to the stage. Each one delivered a full concert set packed with some of the finest blues guitar playing youll ever hear. Bobby Parker, Clarence ""Gatemouth"" Brown and Buddy Guy are all headline acts in their own right so it was a real coup to get them on one line-up. Throw in the guest live performances by Carlos Santana and Chic maestro Nile Rodgers and blues heaven is complete!
